system.requirements:
Tier 3; BS 40, Two-Weapon Wielder (Ranged)
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse, Unaligned
system.effect: Reduce Two-Weapon Fighting Penalty to -10 when wielding two one-handed pistols. If character also has Ambidextrous Talent, reduce penalty to +0.

description.value: Reduce Two-Weapon Fighting Penalty to -10 when wielding two one-handed pistols. If character also has Ambidextrous Talent, reduce penalty to +0.
